# EasyFreeResume

> 100% free, no-sign-up resume builder with ATS-optimized templates. PDF and DOCX export. No account required â€” data stays in your browser.

## Key Facts
- URL: https://easyfreeresume.com
- Pricing: Free (all features, forever, no hidden fees)
- Formats: PDF, DOCX
- Templates: ATS-friendly professional designs
- Privacy: No account required, data stays in browser
- No watermarks, no paywalls, no trial limits

## Resume Builder
- [Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/templates): Browse all resume templates
- [ATS-Friendly Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/ats-resume-templates): Templates optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems
- [Modern Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/templates/modern-resume-templates)
- [Minimalist Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/templates/minimalist-resume-templates)
- [Student Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/templates/resume-templates-for-students)

## CV Builder (UK/AU/NZ)
- [CV Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/cv-templates)
- [ATS-Friendly CV Templates](https://easyfreeresume.com/cv-templates/ats-friendly)
- [Free CV Builder](https://easyfreeresume.com/free-cv-builder-no-sign-up)
